REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0263 reute u f BC-FRIED.-KRUPP-GMBH-<KR 03-26 0055

TEXT.TITLE: FRIED. KRUPP GMBH <KRPG.D> YEAR 1986
TEXT.BODY: Provisional world group 1986 third party turnover 15.9 billion marks vs 18.5 billion. Third party incoming orders 15.5 billion vs 16.9 billion. Orders on hand at end-1986 9.1 billion vs 10.3 billion. Workforce at end-1986 68,043 vs 67,402. REUTER
